hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Map of the Ice Cavern# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Damp√©'s Hut#.

hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.
